Beyond Capacity Management

The document discusses how health systems can ensure value for money in addressing the elective surgical care backlog created by COVID-19. It highlights the need for collaboration and learning among countries and global organizations to expand the delivery of value-based care at scale.

Key Concepts:

  • elective care backlog
  • value for money
  • healthcare partnerships
  • Backlog of surgical procedures
  • Impact of COVID-19 on healthcare
  • Delayed elective surgeries and health outcomes
elective surgical care COVID-19 value-based healthcare health systems capacity management surgical backlog COVID-19 health containment policies elective surgeries healthcare delays
